56662.en: <voice 00060_00056662><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Huh... This is...!<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56662.ja: <voice 00060_00056662><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「ほう……　これは！<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56662.ko: <voice 00060_00056662><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 오오, 이건……!<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56663.en:
<voice 00300_00056663><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Wow, delicious! It's so fresh, and the
flavor has been well preserved!<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56663.ja:
<voice 00300_00056663><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「うん。うまい！
　作りたての味が　しっかり保持されておる！<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56663.ko:
<voice 00300_00056663><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 음, 맛있군!
　갓 만들었을 때의 맛이 잘 보존됐어!<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56663.zh-Hans:
<voice 00300_00056663><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯。太好吃了！
还保持着刚刚做好时的味道！<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56663.zh-Hant:
<voice 00300_00056663><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯，好吃！
保留了剛做好的新鮮滋味！<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56664.en:
<voice 00330_00056664><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>With this, even food that is years old will
still taste the same as when it was first
prepared.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56664.ja:
<voice 00330_00056664><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「これなら　たとえ　数年経った料理でも
　できたてと変わらぬ味で
　おいしく　食べられるだろうな。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56664.ko:
<voice 00330_00056664><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 이 정도면 몇 년이 지난 요리도
　갓 만들었을 때와 다름없이
　맛있게 먹을 수 있겠지.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56664.zh-Hans:
<voice 00330_00056664><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>这样就算是放了好几年的料理，
也依然可以保持
刚制作出来时的味道吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56664.zh-Hant:
<voice 00330_00056664><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>這樣不論是
放了多少年的料理，
都可以吃到剛做好時的美味吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56665.en:
<voice 00430_00056665><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Honestly, that Hollow... He has the skill, but
can't do it unless he's backed into a
corner... What a shame.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56665.ja:
<voice 00430_00056665><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「……まったく　ホーローのヤツめ。
　これほどの技を　持っているのに
　追いつめられないと　できないとは　情けない。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56665.ko:
<voice 00430_00056665><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: ……나 원, 호로 그 녀석.
　이만한 능력이 있으면서도
　발등에 불이 떨어져야 완성하다니 한심하군.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56665.zh-Hans:
<voice 00430_00056665><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……霍洛那家伙真是的，
明明技术这么好，
不被逼急了就什么也做不出来，真丢人啊。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56665.zh-Hant:
<voice 00430_00056665><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……真受不了霍洛那傢伙，
明明能力很好，
卻總要人逼他才做得出來，真沒用。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56666.en:
<voice 00460_00056666><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Certainly, this time he rushed to you for
help, didn't he...<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56666.ja:
<voice 00460_00056666><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「きっと　今回も　あわてて
　<pc>に手伝ってくれるよう
　泣きついたことだろうて……。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56666.ko:
<voice 00460_00056666><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 필시 이번에도 당황해서
　<pc>에게 도와달라고
　울며불며 사정했겠지…….<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56666.zh-Hans:
<voice 00460_00056666><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>他这次也一定是慌慌张张地
哭着找<pc>你帮忙吧……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56666.zh-Hant:
<voice 00460_00056666><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>這次他也一定是慌張地哭著
拜託<pc>幫忙吧……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56667.en:
<voice 00540_00056667><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>But if this is what came from it, he's done
well. Chefs the world over will be elated to
hear of this new elixir, I'm sure of it.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56667.ja:
<voice 00540_00056667><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「だが　これだけの成果を上げれば　上出来だ。
　この料理に使われている秘薬を　広めてやれば
　世界中の料理人が　よろこぶだろうな。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56667.ko:
<voice 00540_00056667><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이만한 성과를 냈으니 눈감아 줄까.
　이 요리에 사용한 비약을 보급하면
　전 세계의 요리사들이 기뻐할 거다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56667.zh-Hans:
<voice 00540_00056667><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>不过他拿出了这么有用的成果，算是非常成功了。
如果把这个用在食物上的秘药向全世界推广，
厨师们一定会非常高兴的。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56667.zh-Hant:
<voice 00540_00056667><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>不過，他拿出的成果很不錯。
如果把這個用在食物上的祕藥推廣出去，
全世界的廚師一定會很高興吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56668.en:
<voice 00660_00056668><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Hmm? "I didn't realize Hollow's research
results would be so modest"... Your face
says it all.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56668.ja:
<voice 00660_00056668><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「うん？　ホーローの使命に関わるという研究が
　こんなに　地味なものだったとは
　……とでも言いたげな　顔だな。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56668.ko:
<voice 00660_00056668><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 응? 호로의 사명과 관련된 연구가
　이런 시시한 거였다니……
　그렇게 말하고 싶은 표정이군.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56668.zh-Hans:
<voice 00660_00056668><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯？看你的表情，你是想说
原来关乎霍洛使命的研究
就是这么普通的研究啊？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56668.zh-Hant:
<voice 00660_00056668><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯？你怎麼一副想說
難道與霍洛的使命有關的研究，
竟然是這麼樸素的東西……的表情？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56669.en:
<voice 00690_00056669><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>For the good of all people this wisdom will
be put to use, that is the sage's duty,
is it not.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56669.ja:
<voice 00690_00056669><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「人々の生活のために
　その叡智を役立てるのも　賢者の務めなのだぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56669.ko:
<voice 00690_00056669><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 사람들의 생활을 위해
　그 지혜를 활용하는 것 또한 현자의 사명이다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56669.zh-Hans:
<voice 00690_00056669><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>用自己的睿智为人们的生活带来便利，
这也是贤者的职责所在。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56669.zh-Hant:
<voice 00690_00056669><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>將智慧用於支援人們的生活，
也是賢者的工作。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56670.en:
<voice 00760_00056670><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>...However, from here on indefinitely, intel
gathering for the battle against Great
Demon King Madesagora, will be our focus.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56670.ja:
<voice 00760_00056670><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「……とはいえ　これから　しばらくは
　その叡智を　大魔王マデサゴーラとの
　戦いのために　結集させることになるだろう。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56670.ko:
<voice 00760_00056670><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 앞으로 한동안은
　그 지혜를 대마왕 마데사고라와의
　싸움을 위해 결집해야 하겠지.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56670.zh-Hans:
<voice 00760_00056670><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……不过在今后的一段时间里，
这些睿智要集中到与大魔王马蒂桑贡拉的
战斗中去了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56670.zh-Hant:
<voice 00760_00056670><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……不過這些智慧
暫時得要為了迎戰大魔王馬德沙葛拉，
而集結在一起。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56671.en:
<voice 00790_00056671><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>We-in that way-from the shadows of history,
continue to defend the world by becoming
guardians of true knowledge...<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56671.ja:
<voice 00790_00056671><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「我らは　そうして歴史の陰から
　世界を支えてきた　善なる知識の守護者……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56671.ko:
<voice 00790_00056671><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 우리는 그렇게 역사의 음지에서
　세계를 지탱해 온 선한 지식의 수호자……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56671.zh-Hans:
<voice 00790_00056671><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>因为我们是在历史的背后
支撑世界的善良的知识守护者……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56671.zh-Hant:
<voice 00790_00056671><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>我們是在歷史的影子中
支援世界的善良知識守護者……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56672.en: <voice 00880_00056672><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>That is the Crown of Wisdom.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56672.ja: <voice 00880_00056672><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「叡智の冠なのだから。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56672.ko: <voice 00880_00056672><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 예지의 관이니까.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56672.zh-Hans: <voice 00880_00056672><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>睿智之冠。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56672.zh-Hant: <voice 00880_00056672><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>因為我們是睿智之冠。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56673.en:
<voice 00970_00056673><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Thank you for your work with all that I
put you through up to now.
<auto_br=3500>
I placed my faith in you, and you-as
expected-are certainly worthy of that trust.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56673.ja:
<voice 00970_00056673><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「……今回のはたらき　ご苦労であったな。
　私の見込んだ通り　やはり　そなたは
　信頼に値する人物であると確信した。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56673.ko:
<voice 00970_00056673><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: ……내 부탁을 들어주느라 고생 많았다.
　내 예상대로 그대가
　믿을 만한 인물이란 걸 확신했다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56673.zh-Hans:
<voice 00970_00056673><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……这次真是辛苦你了，
我看人果然没错，
你是一个值得信赖的人。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56673.zh-Hant:
<voice 00970_00056673><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……這次你辛苦了。
不愧是我認可的人，
我再次確信你是位值得信賴的人物了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56674.en:
<voice 01000_00056674><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>From this point on, I will call upon your
help again, <pc>.
<auto_br=3500>
This is thanks for delivering the letter to
Hollow and returning with his research
results. Please accept it.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56674.ja:
<voice 01000_00056674><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「これからも　協力を頼むぞ。<pc>。
　これは　ホーローに手紙を届け　研究成果を
　持ちかえってくれた礼だ。受け取ってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56674.ko:
<voice 01000_00056674><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 앞으로도 도와주기 바란다, <pc>.
　이건 호로에게 편지를 전해 주고
　연구 성과를 받아 온 답례다. 받아다오.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56674.zh-Hans:
<voice 01000_00056674><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>今后也要麻烦你多多协助我们，<pc>。
你把信交给了霍洛，还把他的研究带回来了。
这是谢礼，请收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56674.zh-Hant:
<voice 01000_00056674><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>接下來也請你多幫忙了，<pc>。
這是為了答謝你送信給霍洛
和把研究成果帶過來的禮物，請收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

56675.en:
<voice 01078_00056675><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Keep up the Lendersia investigations!
<auto_br=3500>
If you meet people and help those in need
on your journey, before long, you'll come to
see a big picture of the world's mysteries.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56675.ja:
<voice 01078_00056675><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「引き続き　レンダーシアの調査を進めてくれ！
　旅をして出会った人々に　チカラを貸してゆけば
　やがて　世界の謎の全容が　見えてくるだろう。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56675.ko:
<voice 01078_00056675><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 그럼 앞으로도 렌더시아 조사에 힘써다오!
　여행하며 만난 사람들을 돕다 보면
　이윽고 세계의 수수께끼의 전모가 보일 테니까.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56675.zh-Hans:
<voice 01078_00056675><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>请你继续进行关于冷达西亚的调查！
只要你向旅途中遇到的人们伸出援手，
总有一天，你一定能探明这个世界的谜团。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56675.zh-Hant:
<voice 01078_00056675><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>繼續進行冷達西亞的調查！
只要借助在旅途中遇到的人們的力量，
總有一天會解開世界謎團的全貌吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
